column4: I did a full upgrades and at the end it asked me what versions of grub did I want I chose the three comparison and then reinstalled ..it didnt boot and went black, the turned pc off and on andd it rebooted but it did thsi on the last reinstall
thanks. My question is is it possible to change grubs version without reinstalling
yes but never touch a running system
thank you very much ! I am still new  so I really appreciate you and the elders here!
